objects.query: Select Name, Description, isActive, ExternalId, ProductCode, Family, StockKeepingUnit, QuantityUnitOfMeasure, DisplayUrl, Audience__c, Product_Image_Static_Resource_Name__c, Available__c, Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId FROM Product2 WHERE Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c = true

Select Name, Phone, Type, Website, Site,Industry, Ownership, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c from Account WHERE Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c = true

SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, Title, Salutation, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Fax, AccountId, Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c FROM Contact where Handcrafted_for_WHM_Demo_Scenario__c = true
